arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c} {c_resource}{SF_2}{/c} seconds
{c_label}Passive:{/c} Subo reveals all enemies and materials in the area.

{c_label}Active:{/c} Subo calls out an enemy target, marking them for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds. Killing a marked enemy restores {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Resource and reduces Subo's {c_important}Seeker{/c} Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} seconds.
